name: OUTTA TIME (LooseJuice)
description:
This game was made for the week 160 Weekly Game Jam, the theme being, "Nothing stays forever". "OUTTA TIME" is a game about platforming from checkpoint to checkpoint, but you only have a very short limited amount of time to get to the next respawn door. You have lost your soul, and you have been doomed to die after each time you leave a door, seek out your soul and reclaim what is rightfully yours.

I legally purchased all of the art, music, and sound effects in this project, please check out the artists behind all of these assets, they are very talented.

https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev

https://shackhal.itch.io/multi-platformer-tileset

https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/8-bit-music-booster-pack

A & D Keys - left & right

Space - Jump  Spacex2 - Double Jump

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Escape - Pause Menu
